function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited use of AI technologies due to lack of data for tracking and prediction of COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Inability to effectively utilize AI for tracking and prediction of COVID-19 cases, leading to potential delays in response and control","Mitigation":"Invest in data collection and standardization efforts to improve the quality and availability of data for AI modeling","Technologies":"Data standardization and interoperability tools, data collection technologies","People":"Health organizations, researchers, and data collection agencies","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Shortage of RT-PCR test kits leading to delays in COVID-19 diagnosis","Impact":"Increased demand for RT-PCR test kits leading to overwhelmed health systems and delays in COVID-19 diagnosis","Mitigation":"Invest in rapid and scalable testing technologies, increase production and distribution of test kits, and implement alternative testing methods","Technologies":"Rapid testing technologies, test kit production and distribution systems","People":"Healthcare professionals, government health agencies, and test kit manufacturers","Owner":"Government health agencies and test kit manufacturers"},{"Description":"Inaccurate and unreliable AI forecasting models due to noisy and limited data","Impact":"Reduced accuracy of AI forecasting models for COVID-19 cases, leading to ineffective predictions and responses","Mitigation":"Improve data quality through standardization, eliminate noise in data, and utilize alternative data sources for training AI models","Technologies":"Data standardization tools, noise reduction algorithms, alternative data sources","People":"AI researchers, data scientists, and health organizations","Owner":"Research institutions and health organizations"}]}
